==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=汤}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|水|alt1=氵|昜|c1=s|c2=p|t1=water|ls=psc}} – a kind of liquid, hot water, soup.

Note that {{lang|zh|昜}} derives from {{zh-l|*日|sun}}, so connotations of “hot” – hot liquid, hot water, soup.

===Etymology===
Related to {{och-l|盪|basin for holding hot water for washing; wash basin}}, {{och-l|煬|to heat; to roast}}.

{{zh-ref|Bodman (1980)}} connects this with {{cog|bo|རླངས||steam, vapour; steamy}}.
